CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Frosted Glass Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We are not rolling out this feature at this time and will make a new announcement when we have an updated timeline. Frosted Glass is a type of background effect that helps users keep their privacy with a background blur, but in a more professional and creative way. It let users have graphics with a blur effect together. Frosted Glass can be activated with a PNG image, that usually comes with some graphics in a transparent background. With the new frosted glass effects, the transparent area is turned into a blur background while the graphic remains as the part of background effect. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management: New retention actions in Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: We will release additional retention actions as part of the Power Automate integration with Microsoft Purview Records Management. You can now relabel a file or an email at the end of its retention period or apply a retention label to a file in SharePoint. You can also delete items in SharePoint, OneDrive, or Exchange with all executed retention actions recorded in the Microsoft Purview Audit log.

When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Language Sync for accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Users will have the option to enable language sync between their accounts and the new Outlook for Windows and web clients. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)

CurrentVersion.description: Previously, admins could not change the retention period set on existing labels configured to start retention from when items were labeled. This feature will remove this restriction, and the resulting behavior will be consistent with other retention label types.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Rosters supporting container sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Organization admins will now be able to apply container labels to rosters in Microsoft Planner. This is enabled directly in Planner and by using Microsoft Graph APIs. Rosters are created automatically for task lists in Microsoft Loop. Tenant admins can make container labels for these rosters mandatory and set a default label, or not make them mandatory. The roster and the Planner plan contained by the Roster then follow container policy settings. For Graph API requests, if labels are mandatory as per tenant settings, roster creation fails if a label is not provided at the time of request.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Rosters supporting container sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Organization admins will now be able to apply container labels to rosters in Microsoft Planner. This is enabled directly in Planner and by using Microsoft Graph APIs. Rosters are created automatically for task lists in Microsoft Loop. Tenant admins can make container labels for these rosters mandatory and set a default label, or not make them mandatory. The roster and the Planner plan contained by the Roster then follow container policy settings. For Graph API requests, if labels are mandatory as per tenant settings, roster creation fails if a label is not provided at the time of request.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
CurrentVersion.description: With the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Performance improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will provide faster page load times when using OneDrive for Web or when using the Files app in Teams irrespective of your network speed. You will see faster screen loading, sorting, filtering, file moving, and renaming. This increase in speed is made possible by storing file metadata in the local cache of your device as opposed to requesting it from the cloud service.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Performance improvements
OldVersion.description: ,This feature will provide faster page load times when using OneDrive for Web or when using the Files app in Teams irrespective of your network speed. You will see faster screen loading, sorting, filtering, file moving, and renaming. This increase in speed is made possible by storing file metadata in the local cache of your device as opposed to requesting it from the cloud service.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
OldVersion.description: ,This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Files On-Demand for Web
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Files On-Demand options of “Always keep on this device” and “Free up space” will soon be made available on OneDrive for Web for your synced files. You will be able to select files and folders to be always available offline on your device directly from within the browser without having to navigate away to File Explore or Finder to perform this action. OneDrive will download these, and they'll take up space on your computer. You will also be able to “Free up space” by selecting a file or folder that you previously marked as "Always keep on this device", and they will no longer take up local storage space.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Files On-Demand for Web
OldVersion.description: ,The Files On-Demand options of “Always keep on this device” and “Free up space” will soon be made available on OneDrive for Web for your synced files. You will be able to select files and folders to be always available offline on your device directly from within the browser without having to navigate away to File Explore or Finder to perform this action. OneDrive will download these, and they'll take up space on your computer. You will also be able to “Free up space” by selecting a file or folder that you previously marked as "Always keep on this device", and they will no longer take up local storage space.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
OldVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
OldVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: ,There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External call routing settings
CurrentVersion.description: End users will now be able to change their external call routing settings directly from the Teams app, allowing them to decide how incoming PSTN calls are routed. Calls can be redirected based on existing unanswered call settings or sent to voicemail. This new capability provides more flexibility for handling customer communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Microsoft Endpoint DLP Support for Windows on ARM (ARM64)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, customers can extend Microsoft Endpoint Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies and actions to endpoints running Windows on ARM (ARM64) which allows them to detect and protect sensitive data in files part of their digital ecosystem. This allows admins to introduce policy controls for scenarios such as when an information worker using a Windows endpoint powered by ARM64 chipset is accessing sensitive files and performing an exfiltration action such as copying to a USB, or copy to clipboard, notepad, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ending the Microsoft Purview legacy alerts ingestion into Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: To increase the relevance of DLP alerts and incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender portal, we are ending the flow of the following legacy alerts into Microsoft 365 Defender portal: eDiscovery Search started or exported, successful exact data match upload, retention auto-labeling policy simulation completed, unusual volume of DLP policy matches, failed exact data match upload, MIP autolabel simulation completed, unusual volume of external file sharing, unusual volume of file deletion. These alerts were created as a result of legacy standalone alert policies. For a better experience, we recommend using the alerting toggle in the DLP policy authoring experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced Incident Communication with DLP Email Templates
CurrentVersion.description:
,
You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can utilize these email templates to: inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more similar scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in a DLP policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
OldVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: New entry point for add-in (WXP) in Home tab for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Support the add-in users to find store entry point more easily and acquire their needed add-ins effectively in Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
OldVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Supports live data sync to Excel
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Forms supports quickly and easily syncing form responses to an Excel file. Now you’ll always have the latest information, updated automatically, so you can leverage the full range of Excel functions to analyze your data and collab with your peers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
CurrentVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
OldVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization in Copilot in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhancements to Viva Goals Copilot to better support customized terminology.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization in Copilot in Viva Goals
OldVersion.description: Enhancements to Viva Goals Copilot to better support customized terminology.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality with supported platforms including Teams, Email, Slack along with Copy link options. They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
OldVersion.description: Facilitate effortless sharing of goals and goal progress with the enhanced sharing functionality in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: video reactions
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will allow users to add or remove reactions to specific points of a recorded video via Stream Web App and Embed. Viewers will be able to see how their colleagues feel about a video and show their support towards the video owner. These reactions will be present in the timeline to highlight the most important parts of the video and can be used for navigation. Also, owners of the video can see detailed analytics about when viewers are reacting to videos and have ability to disable the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share contact information of people in Microsoft Teams chat
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now share the contact information of someone who is not in a chat to make it easy for others to confidently get to know other collaborators.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share contact information of people in Microsoft Teams chat
OldVersion.description: Users can now share the contact information of someone who is not in a chat to make it easy for others to confidently get to know other collaborators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Select the domain to choose for Teams Email Service
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to select the domain to send emails to their users via Teams Email Service

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Select the domain to choose for Teams Email Service
OldVersion.description: Admins will be able to select the domain to send emails to their users via Teams Email Service

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
CurrentVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, this will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up-to-date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap now available for Copilot users
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot users can access intelligent recap after meetings to get a summary of the meeting, including: personalized timeline markers to easily browse the recordings by when you joined or left, when a screen was shared, and when your name was mentioned; browse recordings by speakers, chapters, and topics; as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, tasks, and jump to name mentions in the transcript.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap now available for Copilot users
OldVersion.description: Copilot users can access intelligent recap after meetings to get a summary of the meeting, including: personalized timeline markers to easily browse the recordings by when you joined or left, when a screen was shared, and when your name was mentioned; browse recordings by speakers, chapters, and topics; as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, tasks, and jump to name mentions in the transcript.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Styles
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to choose between three different text styles, allowing greater flexibility and personalization of text in whiteboards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
OldVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add video to a playlist from an embedded video
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add a video to a playlist directly from embedded videos across Microsoft 365 (SharePoint pages, Outlook, teams, Viva Engage, etc.) without having to open the video in Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Content camera on New Teams Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: This feature it will be available on new Team Teams on Windows and Mac, making whiteboards, printed documents, books, and other physical objects the focus of your Teams meeting. With minimal setup, you can help meeting attendees who aren’t in the room feel more included and engaged in your next class, demo, or brainstorming session.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
CurrentVersion.description: This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Administration in Microsoft Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Centralized IT administration of Viva Connections experiences along with home sites within the Microsoft Viva admin experience in Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook for Windows: Send email from your proxy email address (alias)
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This feature had been delayed and the timeline has been updated. Send email from a proxy email address or account alias rather than your primary email address. The alias email address will be preserved in the FROM and REPLY TO for the recipients.

OldVersion.title: Outlook for Windows: Send email from your proxy email address (alias)
OldVersion.description: ,This feature had been delayed and the timeline has been updated. Send email from a proxy email address or account alias rather than your primary email address. The alias email address will be preserved in the FROM and REPLY TO for the recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings:  ''Cc" functionality to email notifications
CurrentVersion.description: 'Cc' an additional email address on confirmation and reminder emails

OldVersion.description: 'Cc' an additional email address on confirmation and reminder emails

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to set a retention period for a policy
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Introducing the ability to define how long content captured by a Communication Compliance policy is retained. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer

CurrentVersion.description: Outlook on the web can now proof your writing simultaneously in up to three languages. Users must select which languages to add in Editor settings.

,
Expand coverage & provide additional capabilities to provide a single unified pane of glass for managing the security settings of any device with Microsoft Defender.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows 11 update readiness reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
App and driver compatibility reports for Windows update planning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Advanced Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Data science and AI powered automation, recommendations and insights enable IT to proactively improve user experiences based on endpoint health and performance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Frosted Glass Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Frosted Glass is a type of background effect that helps users keep their privacy with a background blur, but in a more professional and creative way. It let users have graphics with a blur effect together. Frosted Glass can be activated with a PNG image, that usually comes with some graphics in a transparent background. With the new frosted glass effects, the transparent area is turned into a blur background while the graphic remains as the part of background effect. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Frosted Glass Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We are not rolling out this feature at this time and will make a new announcement when we have an updated timeline. Frosted Glass is a type of background effect that helps users keep their privacy with a background blur, but in a more professional and creative way. It let users have graphics with a blur effect together. Frosted Glass can be activated with a PNG image, that usually comes with some graphics in a transparent background. With the new frosted glass effects, the transparent area is turned into a blur background while the graphic remains as the part of background effect. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Scope the administration of retention and retention label policies (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can leverage Administrative Units in Azure Active Directory to define who can configure and manage policies in Microsoft Purview. This update will include the ability to set a Records Management admin for a specific geography, department, or other unit, who can manage retention and retention label policies for their unit.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management: New retention actions in Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: We will release additional retention actions as part of the Power Automate integration with Microsoft Purview Records Management. You can now relabel a file or an email at the end of its retention period or apply a retention label to a file in SharePoint. You can also delete items in SharePoint, OneDrive, or Exchange with all executed retention actions recorded in the Microsoft Purview Audit log.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will no longer be rolling out to Teams. We will publish a new announcement when we have a new release schedule confirmed. Users will be able to enable a second video stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature. When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for Android
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9 videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9 videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit action.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Language Sync for accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Users will have the option to enable language sync between their accounts and the new Outlook for Windows and web clients. The option can be found in Settings in those clients, once enabled it will sync the language a user has set in "MyAccount" with the Outlook clients mentioned. This means, the language that a user has set in "MyAccount" will start to be used in Outlook. This feature will be off by default and users can choose to opt-in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)
CurrentVersion.description: In the Tasks app and Microsoft Planner, which helps power the Tasks app in Teams, buckets are a common way to organize tasks into different areas of work. The mobile experience for the Tasks app in Teams will soon be updated to make it easier to filter to a specific bucket or set of buckets, so you can focus on tasks in your area. We expect this simple user experience change to provide greater focus and greater productivity, while maintaining the familiar look and feel throughout the Tasks app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Admin Center: Deploy and manage Shifts for your frontline teams in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will gain the ability to standardize Shifts settings (open shifts, swap shifts requests, offer shifts requests, time off requests and time clock), identify schedule owners, and create scheduling groups uniformly for all frontline teams at the tenant level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-call user experience
CurrentVersion.description: Making it easier for users to access calling capabilities with a redesigned user experience during calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit (Premium) - Customized Retention Policies: Long-Term Retention
CurrentVersion.description: Currently available in public preview, releasing several new long-term retention policies as part of the 10-year Audit Log Retention add-on SKU. These include 3 years, 5 years, and 7 years. These are available for customers with the 10-Year Audit Log Retention license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Bitlocker end user key retrieval
CurrentVersion.description: As an end user, you can view the BitLocker recovery key for devices which you are the owner using the Company Portal website.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Hardware backed device attestation
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancing Windows compliance policy - device health: adding 5 additional hardware attestation settings specific to Windows 11 - using advanced platform security features like Memory Integrity and Access Protection, Firmware protection, Virtualization-based security, and Early Launch Antimalware protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Bring your own content using external URLs from sources like YouTube, Vimeo, news articles, etc while creating learning collections
CurrentVersion.description: Users can add content using external links from sources like YouTube, Vimeo, news articles, etc while creating learning collections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed. Note: We have updated the release phase to reflect the current state as we are evaluating this release and have paused the rollout. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to change retention period on labels set to start retention based on “When items were labeled”
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, admins could not change the retention period set on existing labels configured to start retention from when items were labeled. This feature will remove this restriction, and the resulting behavior will be consistent with other retention label types.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Rosters supporting container sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Organization admins will now be able to apply container labels to rosters in Microsoft Planner. This is enabled directly in Planner and by using Microsoft Graph APIs. Rosters are created automatically for task lists in Microsoft Loop. Tenant admins can make container labels for these rosters mandatory and set a default label, or not make them mandatory. The roster and the Planner plan contained by the Roster then follow container policy settings. For Graph API requests, if labels are mandatory as per tenant settings, roster creation fails if a label is not provided at the time of request.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Immersive spaces in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Immersive spaces in Teams makes it easier for Teams users to transform their meetings into a 3D experience. With just one click, you can connect with your team in a pre-built immersive space right from the view menu in Teams meetings. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified channel creation
CurrentVersion.description: We added the option to create a channel directly from the + button in the Teams app, making it easier for the user to create a channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplified team create
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a team, the new default experience will be ‘create a team from scratch’, making it a simpler and quicker experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
CurrentVersion.description: With the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Performance improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will provide faster page load times when using OneDrive for Web or when using the Files app in Teams irrespective of your network speed. You will see faster screen loading, sorting, filtering, file moving, and renaming. This increase in speed is made possible by storing file metadata in the local cache of your device as opposed to requesting it from the cloud service.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Files On-Demand for Web
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Files On-Demand options of “Always keep on this device” and “Free up space” will soon be made available on OneDrive for Web for your synced files. You will be able to select files and folders to be always available offline on your device directly from within the browser without having to navigate away to File Explore or Finder to perform this action. OneDrive will download these, and they'll take up space on your computer. You will also be able to “Free up space” by selecting a file or folder that you previously marked as "Always keep on this device", and they will no longer take up local storage space.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Lead-Lag in task dependencies
CurrentVersion.description: Set advancement and delay between tasks in your project.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections Mobile for Android
CurrentVersion.description: Adding a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva connections users on mobile in Android.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Classic Outlook for Windows - Summarize by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can summarize email threads and extract key points.

More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort By Category
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to sort their emails by categories in inbox and other folders. It will help users stay focused and organized by allowing them to group related emails together directly in the message list. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web.

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Auto-rollout of Conditional Access policies
CurrentVersion.description: Starting in November 2023, Microsoft will begin automatically protecting customers with Microsoft managed Conditional Access policies. All eligible tenants will be notified prior to this rollout.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Accessibility Updates to Tables
CurrentVersion.description: Accessibility improvements to tables within the text webpart allow users to specify row and column layouts, as well as provide alternative text labels for screen readers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated Outlook for Android Settings
CurrentVersion.description: The whole Outlook for Android Settings page is being updated to be better organized so that you can find the settings you need more efficiently.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Scheduling administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to attend the on-demand appointment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Scheduling administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to attend the on-demand appointment.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp Premium features
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp Premium features help users take their content to the next level. With Clipchamp Premium, users can easily apply brand fonts, colors and logos with brand kit, add top-tier assets for commercial use, and export crisp, well-defined visuals as 4K, 30fps, MP4 files and access advanced analytics. Clipchamp Premium features will be available as a standalone SKU, as well as an add-on to the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie Support for Multiple Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now join up to 5 channels in multi-channel mode, easily switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: ,There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External call routing settings
CurrentVersion.description: End users will now be able to change their external call routing settings directly from the Teams app, allowing them to decide how incoming PSTN calls are routed. Calls can be redirected based on existing unanswered call settings or sent to voicemail. This new capability provides more flexibility for handling customer communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Microsoft Endpoint DLP Support for Windows on ARM (ARM64)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, customers can extend Microsoft Endpoint Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies and actions to endpoints running Windows on ARM (ARM64) which allows them to detect and protect sensitive data in files part of their digital ecosystem. This allows admins to introduce policy controls for scenarios such as when an information worker using a Windows endpoint powered by ARM64 chipset is accessing sensitive files and performing an exfiltration action such as copying to a USB, or copy to clipboard, notepad, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ending the Microsoft Purview legacy alerts ingestion into Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: To increase the relevance of DLP alerts and incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender portal, we are ending the flow of the following legacy alerts into Microsoft 365 Defender portal: eDiscovery Search started or exported, successful exact data match upload, retention auto-labeling policy simulation completed, unusual volume of DLP policy matches, failed exact data match upload, MIP autolabel simulation completed, unusual volume of external file sharing, unusual volume of file deletion. These alerts were created as a result of legacy standalone alert policies. For a better experience, we recommend using the alerting toggle in the DLP policy authoring experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced Incident Communication with DLP Email Templates
CurrentVersion.description:
,
You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can utilize these email templates to: inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more similar scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced Incident Communication with DLP Email Templates
CurrentVersion.description:
,
You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can utilize these email templates to: inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more similar scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in a DLP policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: New entry point for add-in (WXP) in Home tab for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Support the add-in users to find store entry point more easily and acquire their needed add-ins effectively in Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Supports live data sync to Excel
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Forms supports quickly and easily syncing form responses to an Excel file. Now you’ll always have the latest information, updated automatically, so you can leverage the full range of Excel functions to analyze your data and collab with your peers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
CurrentVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization in Copilot in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhancements to Viva Goals Copilot to better support customized terminology.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Facilitate effortless sharing of goals and goal progress with the enhanced sharing functionality in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality with supported platforms including Teams, Email, Slack along with Copy link options. They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: video reactions
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will allow users to add or remove reactions to specific points of a recorded video via Stream Web App and Embed. Viewers will be able to see how their colleagues feel about a video and show their support towards the video owner. These reactions will be present in the timeline to highlight the most important parts of the video and can be used for navigation. Also, owners of the video can see detailed analytics about when viewers are reacting to videos and have ability to disable the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share contact information of people in Microsoft Teams chat
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now share the contact information of someone who is not in a chat to make it easy for others to confidently get to know other collaborators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Select the domain to choose for Teams Email Service
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to select the domain to send emails to their users via Teams Email Service

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
CurrentVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, this will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up-to-date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap now available for Copilot users
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot users can access intelligent recap after meetings to get a summary of the meeting, including: personalized timeline markers to easily browse the recordings by when you joined or left, when a screen was shared, and when your name was mentioned; browse recordings by speakers, chapters, and topics; as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, tasks, and jump to name mentions in the transcript.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Styles
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to choose between three different text styles, allowing greater flexibility and personalization of text in whiteboards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add video to a playlist from an embedded video
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add a video to a playlist directly from embedded videos across Microsoft 365 (SharePoint pages, Outlook, teams, Viva Engage, etc.) without having to open the video in Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Content camera on New Teams Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: This feature it will be available on new Team Teams on Windows and Mac, making whiteboards, printed documents, books, and other physical objects the focus of your Teams meeting. With minimal setup, you can help meeting attendees who aren’t in the room feel more included and engaged in your next class, demo, or brainstorming session.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
CurrentVersion.description: This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Administration in Microsoft Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Centralized IT administration of Viva Connections experiences along with home sites within the Microsoft Viva admin experience in Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook for Windows: Send email from your proxy email address (alias)
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This feature had been delayed and the timeline has been updated. Send email from a proxy email address or account alias rather than your primary email address. The alias email address will be preserved in the FROM and REPLY TO for the recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings:  ''Cc" functionality to email notifications
CurrentVersion.description: 'Cc' an additional email address on confirmation and reminder emails

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to set a retention period for a policy
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Introducing the ability to define how long content captured by a Communication Compliance policy is retained. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications pane in Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Using the Notifications pane, you can stay connected with updates focused on you, like @mentions, that you might have missed in the context of your regular mail.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: System based Alerting on Microsoft Intune
CurrentVersion.description: An administrator can configure alerts and notifications specific to Windows 365 Cloud PCs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Apps for Teams meetings available in Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Now, you can configure or add an app for Teams meetings while scheduling a meeting from Outlook. This app will be ready to use when you chat or join the meeting in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: App type support in the Store for Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Improved filters and badges in the SharePoint Store to support Viva Connections ACEs. Users can easily identify and find adaptive cards that work in Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Outlook: Search now shows results from Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Search results in Outlook on the web will now show Teams messages and files shared in Teams conversations

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Configure learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create and manage learning academies in the Viva Learning Admin tab.
